definition: north China army (esp. during the warlords period)

sentences.english: The following is the text of Senator Clinton's letter today to the Secretary of the Army.
sentences.chinese: 全文如下參議員克林頓的一封信，今天陸軍大臣。

sentences.english: The intelligence service conceived a grand design to assassinate the War Minister.
sentences.chinese: 情報機構策劃了一項暗殺陸軍部長的重大計劃。

sentences.english: The soldiers of Baker Company , 31st Infantry, would be in reserve.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍31步兵團的B連被留作爲預備隊。

sentences.english: A captain in the Navy ranks above a captain in the Army.
sentences.chinese: 美國陸軍上尉或海軍上校有由總統簽名的委任狀。

sentences.english: Pakistan"s Chief of Army Staff Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani was also present during the ceremony."
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦陸軍總參謀長也出席了授獎儀式。

sentences.english: Representatives of the Air Force and Army observed the tests.
sentences.chinese: 來自美國空軍和陸軍的代表觀察了此次試驗。

sentences.english: She was then working in an army hospital.
sentences.chinese: 那時她在一家陸軍醫院工作。

sentences.english: An army major ranks between a captain and a colonel.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍中校比少校軍銜高。

sentences.english: The Army and Marine Corps have 80 systems in theater.
sentences.chinese: 陸軍和海軍陸戰隊在戰場上有80套系統。

sentences.english: On the far farm the armys arms are kept warm by a swarm of bees.
sentences.chinese: 在遠方的農場上，陸軍的武器被一羣蜜蜂保暖。

sentences.english: The new president carried out a purge of disloyal army officers.
sentences.chinese: 新總統對不忠誠的陸軍軍官進行了一次整肅。

sentences.english: The U.S. Army's war manual, for example, offers no guidance on rules of engagement.
sentences.chinese: 美國陸軍的作戰手冊並沒有做出具體指導。

sentences.english: German Army retreats to the Hindenburg Line.
sentences.chinese: 德國陸軍務虛的興登堡線。

sentences.english: US Army Rangers at Point du Hoc, Omaha Beach.
sentences.chinese: 美國陸軍遊騎兵在點報責，奧馬哈海灘。

sentences.english: 1901 - U. S. Army War College is established.

definition: commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
